评论详情: This belt runs TTS and looks excellent with high-waisted jeans. The holes are punched a long way around, so they are versatile. The color is an excellent milky white, and the silver details are sturdy.

评论详情: I love the studded design of this belt, it's very high quality, and it's a thin design so there's never any issue with any of my jeans belt loops. I am very happy with this stylish belt!

类型: Color: BlackSize: Fit Waist Size 32-38 Inches
评论详情: This is the perfect, classic but slightly edgy belt. It is right in between a skinny and wide belt so it fits most pant styles and body types.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: Super Cute, Quality Belt with Beautiful Silver Accents!
类型: Color: CoffeeSize: Fit Waist Size 32-38 Inches
评论详情: I got this belt a couple of days ago and I wore it all day yesterday and today. It is such a stylish, cool-looking belt. I got the coffee color and I've worn it with both gray/black jeans (as in the photo) and blue jeans. The coffee color is a great, neutral color.  There are so many things I love about this belt. I got it to wear with hip-hugging jeans. It has a LOT of holes, a total of 9, which is far more than most belts, so it is flexible for wearing with jeans that vary in how hip-hugging they are. The detailed silver buckle and the silver end tip have very pretty etching that make the belt especially pretty and high-end looking.  I love the fact that the belt is made of a "polyurethane leather." I am a vegetarian and I also never buy leather made from animals. You would have a hard time telling that this isn't real leather. I am thrilled with the quality look and feel of this belt. It looks like it would cost a lot more than it does.

类型: Color: BlackSize: Fit Waist Size 26-33 Inches
评论详情: I wanted a studded bell that is not overly done as I am not looking for a punk rock look, but more of a rock look.  This is perfect.  The belt is nicely made and the studs are securely fastened.

类型: Color: CoffeeSize: Fit Waist Size 32-38 Inches
评论详情: Love how soft it feels. The silver accents are very well matched with the brown color of the leather.
